Driving Directions

Driving Directions

Highest and best by 12/19/2023 6pm!! Very large one owner home set back from the road on over 7 acres of land with a stream on one side. Come sit on the large front porch or enjoy the expansive yard. You can see the quality throughout from the Anderson windows, Heil central air, solid wood 6 panel doors, Corian counters, first floor laundry, hot and cold outdoor water, central vac, an extra sub panel in the basement for all your hobbies, and the whole house fan. There is also a huge partially finished bonus room over the garage that is plumbed for a full bath waiting for you to finish it into your dream master suite. Many recent updates including the roof 2021 APO, extra insulation 2023 APO, wood laminate flooring 2022 APO, interior all repainted this fall, and the carpets just shampooed. Move right into this gem!
